name: IQuit
0:
”Alexa start I Quit.”
”Alexa ask I Quit to log success.”
”Alexa tell I Quit that I failed.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: i. quit
des:
I Quit, helps you maintain your streak of quitting a bad habit, like smoking, drinking, nail-biting or even daydreaming to go to the unicorn island.

By adding this skill you are already one step forward in your journey of becoming a Better YOU. Let's make it fun and let me help you as you progress.

You may say "Alexa tell I Quit that " followed by : 
To record success:
 "I made it"
 "I did it again"
 "Today was a success"
 "I am proud of myself"
 "It was a good day"

To record failure:
 "It was a bad day"
 "I couldn't make it today"
 "I gave up"
 "I couldn't resist today"

Or, you can say "Alexa start I Quit" and follow the directions.

You can check your progress by saying, "Alexa ask I Quit about my progress".

...and there are many more fun things and surprises we will discover as we move ahead.

Good Luck. 
Let's celebrate YOU.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
